# Port Mahon (Delaware)

|postal_code_type =

Port Mahon was a port in Kent County, Delaware, United States located along the Delaware Bay at the eastern end of Port Mahon Road, northeast of Little Creek. and served as a port for the town. It is also located nearby Leipsic. Named for the Spanish city, Mah√≥n, it is locally pronounced  "MAY-hon" (not Mah-HONE). It functions as public fishing piers.
See also
*Mahon River Light
*Little Creek Wildlife Area
*Bombay Hook National Wildlife Refuge
